channel.title: Question!
channel.description:
How can i do that when u press on an NPC, it asks: "Do you want to buy beer?" And that when u press "no", conversation gets closed, but that when u press "Yes", 2 coins go away of ur inventory and u get a beer. And when u don't got enough, the NPC says: "You don't have enough gold" en then when u press next, conversation gets closed.
And, please give me the right code. Before this one, someone else gaved me a wrong code, and me server got f*cked up. Couldn't compile. But luckily, i could delete the codes, and me server got fine.
And if u need this: Im using 317 HomieScape!!

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

Oh, homiescape. Sorry. didnt read it. Can’t help you there. I didnt like homiescape tbh.

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

case 147: c.talk("Hello, would you like to go the Dagannoth kings?", 1703); break; case 148: c.choice("Yes.", "No."); break; case 149: c.talk("Hello, would you like to purchase some beer?", 737); break; case 150: c.choice("Yes.", "No."); break; case 151: c.talk("Enjoy!", 737); break; case 152: c.talk("Looks like you don't have 2 gold pieces..", 737); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @chi-kitory chi-kitory
item.description:
@chi-kitory wrote:

find the dialogue and you will see something like dialogue115 || dialogue116 || etc

this connects dialogues.
so connect the nothing and the yes to the next dialogue.

Read full topic
